title: Does Social Media Make Us Depressed?  (with Kati Morton)
description:
LMFT, YouTuber and author Kati Morton is on the show to talk about caring for your mental health. Plus, Jillian and the team revisit the happiness conversation; and, how to properly do a variety of pull-ups.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ
